recent_news: OOMNIUM AG is a Zürich-based startup founded by Leandro Davies — limited public information available
CEO of an active Swiss startup — potential Bramha ESG or Nitara customer
enrichment_data.outreach_angle: Leandro leads a Swiss startup and is a peer founder in Zürich. He could be an early adopter of Nitara (conversation-first AI business partner for solo entrepreneurs) or Bramha ESG (Swiss SME compliance). Reach out with a product invite: 'Leandro — I have been building Nitara, an AI business partner for Swiss founders. We are opening a small early access cohort. Would love to have you try it and give feedback. 5 minutes to set up, no obligation.' This is a low-friction outreach that could yield a paying customer or referral.
